gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 143, Heat 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Heat, 143-110. Jayson Tatum led the way for the Celtics with a game-high 26 points, along with eight rebounds and four assists, while Jaylen Brown added 18 points (4-8 3PT FG) and five assists in the victory. Bam Adebayo (19 points, five rebounds) and Tyler Herro (19 points, six assists) combined for 38 points for the Heat in the losing effort. The Celtics win their third straight game as they improve to 35-10 on the season, while the Heat fall to 24-21.
